FileFormat.FormatDescription: Stata is a research data analysis and statistical software package. The DTA format contains the Stata dataset. DTA version 115 is known to be associated with Stata software version 12. Please contact the PRONOM team if you can provide further information about this format.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: 's' 0x(01|02)=(big|little) endianness filetype (0x01) 0x00 at position 109 Based on specification: http://www.stata.com/help.cgi?dta_115
